brand.name: Panaashe Organics
brand.ethicalInfo1: Panaashe Organics is an affordable, active lifestyleÂ clothing brand for women who want their clothes to reflect their sustainable lifestyle.
brand.ethicalInfo2:
Panaashe Organics' environment rating is 'great'. It uses a high proportion of eco-friendly materials including organic cotton which is Global Organic Textile Standard (GOTS) certified and elastane made from recycled bottles. Its use of eco-friendly materials do not require the use of chemicals and limit the amount of water and wastewater used in production, but it does not have any information regarding its chemical, water or wastewater policies.

Its labor rating is 'it's a start'. It uses Global Organic Textile Standard (GOTS) certified cotton. It mentions partnering with Fair Trade artisans to produce some of its products, however it does not publish any more information.

Its animal rating is 'great'. It does not use any animal products.

Panaashe Organics is rated 'Good' based on information from our own research.
brand.positiveText: Dear Panaashe Organics, I love the style and features of your products, and also that you care about people, the planet and animals. Good On You!
brand.negativeText: Dear Panaashe Organics, I love the style and features of your products, but I'm concerned about the impact of your brand on workers, the environment and animals. Until you do better I'll be looking for alternative brands that meet my needs.
